conversations.content: You should verify your account first. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The response indicates that the user's account needs verification before the password can be updated. An OTP has been sent to the user's email for verification. I should ask the user for the OTP to proceed with the verification and then update the password.
<|/Function_Thought|>

Can you please provide the OTP that was sent to your email so I can verify your account and proceed with changing the password?
